text: wow
fairy tales
[Music]
once upon a time in a small village
there was a poor guy named jaden
who lived with his old mother in the
past
jaden's paternal family had been thieves
for three generations
but by the end they still had nothing
left
jaden also got all the tricks of
stealing from his father
despite being a kind guy he still had to
do this bad job to have the money to
take care of his old mother
jaden looked sad he thought am i right
when doing these things
although we have money to overcome
difficulties i still feel very bad
jaden's mother was really upset when she
knew that jaden still had to do the bad
things every single day
this had happened for a long time then
one day
she became seriously ill and was
bedridden
jaden's thoughts went back and forth he
worriedly thought
this is a case of emergency mom is
seriously ill
but we have no money left how can i get
money to
cure mother jaden had no choice but to
risk stealing more and more
until one day he was caught red-handed
i thought it was someone else but that
was you
jaden the thief
the nature can never be changed three
generations of stealing
you will be no different teach him a
lesson
jaden was frightened he looked at the
farmers and said
please please forgive me the two
villagers
angrily hit jaden forgive you
forgive you beaten by the villagers
jaden went back home with nothing his
mother's illness was also getting worse
beside the bed jaden held a bowl of
medicine
he said gloomily mom try to have this
i just bought it for you his sick mother
nodded her head and
said my dear stop stealing i would
rather die than drink this bowl of
medicine
which was bought by stealing money just
give up and be a good man
that is my last wish listening to the
advice of his mom
jaden decided to find his way back to
normal life
but the only thing jayden could get was
the suspicious eye of the villagers
wherever he went
jayden was walking two villagers saw him
they were startled as they stared at
jaden they quickly left
jaden watch them leaving inside be a
good person
but how can i get away from everyone's
suspicion
jaden stopped he had an idea
if i do all good things to make up for
the mistakes i've made
will everyone accept it that's right
i have to try right after that jaden met
david
a thug who lived by stealing david held
jaden's arm
happily saying oh jaden my idol
i admired your family's reputation do
you want to create a gang of thieves
with me
we will quickly become rich and famous
jaden froze and asked
who are you david smiled and pointed to
himself
i'm david who lives on the other side of
this hill
my stealing skills are also very good
jaden thought and shook his head
refusing the offer
no david i don't want to be a thief
anymore i want to be a good person
david laughed out loud and said what
good person a guy with three generations
of thieves
living by stealing how can you say that
are you kidding me did i get something
wrong
jaden frowned and reclaimed that's it
david believe me we can work hard
together and until one day
everyone will have a different view of
us
david angrily said you are crazy
ridiculous what a hypocrite your family
has three generations worth of thieves
and you want to be a good person
whatever you do
people will always consider you a thief
then david turned and walked away
jayden watched in shock since then
jaden started to work harder to earn his
living
he always tried to find opportunities to
help others
near the village there was a big river
flowing across
every day all villagers had to cross
that river
every time there was a flood no one
dared cross it
however no bridges had been built at all
to help the villagers
jayden talked to the leader of the
village sir
why haven't we built the bridge to help
the villagers here
the leader of the village shook his head
and said
it's difficult very difficult in the
past
many people thought about that but
nobody wanted to sacrifice the time
so they all gave up everyone would be
very grateful to anyone who could build
a bridge
jayden's eyes lit up he was very
delighted
[Music]
why don't i try to build a bridge to
help everyone
it's a good thing to make up for my
mistakes from before
from that very day apart from the time
taking care of his mother
jaden went to the jungle to cut wood and
transfer the wood panels back to the
bank to build a bridge
but the river was so wide which made it
hard for him to build alone
therefore even though he worked so hard
he could only finish a small part of it
every day
everyone had also started to pay
attention to what jaden was doing
three people gathered and whispered
together
[Music]
that's jaden the thief what is he doing
[Music]
i'm not sure perhaps he wants to build
the bridge
[Music]
oh well how can anyone be patient enough
to build the bridge
i bet he's up to something many people
couldn't understand what jaden was doing
they tried to throw stones at him
because they thought that kaiden was
planning on stealing something there
when jaden worked by the river during
the daytime he could look after and
arrange the wood very neatly
however when he was not there at night
the evil thieves came again
stealthily taking away the best wooden
boards
they also pushed all the lathes that
jaden had carefully prepared
into the river and the next day
jayden would simply start it all over
again
struggling with many difficulties jaden
never gave up
he determined to finish the bridge as an
atonement to the villagers
[Music]
due to working too hard one day jaden
was exhausted and fell down by the river
fortunately a luxurious carriage
carrying the wyatt noble family
passed by wyatt and his daughter laura
stopped and helped jaden
after a while he recovered jaden smiled
bent down and said thank you very much
for helping me
who are you why did you faint here
i'm jaden i'm building a bridge for the
villagers to use when the flood season
comes
lara was surprised that is a meaningful
thing
i am laura and this is my father we are
the wyatt
noble family nice to meet you jaden's
side and said
because of my mistakes in the past and
those of my family members who used to
be thieves for three generations
i want to change and do good things to
redeem myself
lara said sympathetically don't be sad
no regrets are late i really admire your
will to be a good person
wyatt said sadly we also have the same
situation
our family has been noble for a long
time but in the past
they did many evil things and left us a
huge fortune
in spite of being rich we still have to
suffer from all sorts of bad reputations
and
live in fear wyatt thought and said
i want to contribute my effort and money
to build this bridge with you
will you agree jaden happily nodded that
would be great
with your help the bridge will be
completed very soon
after that wyatt and jaden built the
bridge together
wyatt spent his money to hire people to
work and to buy the best materials for
building the bridge
with more people working together the
speed of building the bridge was also
much faster
and soon the solid pillars of the bridge
were completed
they took turns looking after the
construction of the bridge by the river
so that thieves wouldn't dare come to
sabotage at night
knowing that jaden also had to take care
of his mother
laura went to live with jaden's mother
in the small house and took care of her
every day lara brought food to her
father and jaden
the two young people gradually fell in
love with each other
laura admired jaden's hard work and his
kindness
he also admired her as the daughter of a
noble family
but laura was always happy and close to
everyone
time went by everything kept going and
the bridge was soon finished
[Music]
right on the night that the bridge had
been completed a great storm came
bringing a fierce flood to the village
the village leader stood in the rain
and called to everyone in fear run
quickly everyone leave all the
properties behind
this is an incredible flood the water is
about to sink our village
the people in the village rushed to find
their way out in the dark
the two villagers explained in panic
where where can we run how how can we be
faster than the flood waters
gosh how do i know is anyone there
please help us
the leader of the village stood in front
of jaden's new bridge
he quickly waved his hand shouting
here's a new bridge
everyone run across the river we can get
away from the flood
what where where is a bridge is it safe
[Music]
does it really matter now run across the
bridge immediately
[Music]
right run or the flood will kill us all
the villagers hurriedly ran across the
bridge to the other side of the river to
avoid the flood
the bridge was extremely stable and
stood strongly before the big waves
that night the historic flood swept
across the village
devastating all their possessions
however
all were lucky to escape safely when the
water receded
the villagers returned together but
everything was just rubble
horrible it was the biggest flood i've
ever seen in my life
fortunately all of us are safe our lives
are the most precious thing
the leader of the village happily said
we are all safe
thanks to the bridge great just the day
before
i didn't even know it existed
[Music]
i know it's the bridge which was built
by jayden and his friends
right it's jaden the thief he saved our
lives
[Music]
yet the day before we stoned him and
chased him away
what a shame
[Music]
no problem i'm glad everyone is safe now
it's jayden it's him the leader of the
village approached happily
patting jaden's shoulder he said jaden
on behalf of the villagers thank you
very much
thanks to you and the bridge everyone
can be safe now
i'm very happy because you gave up your
bad deeds to be a good person
welcome back to our village
jaden smiled happily nodding in thanks
suddenly there was a loud cry
catch him it turned out that the thief
was david
the thug who always wanted to invite
jaden to continue doing bad things
thief david quickly ran behind him were
three villagers chasing
he was dressed in ragged clothes they
ran to grab david
jaden was really surprised he approached
and asked
david is that you david stared a blankly
at jayden
he was surprised then david stammered
jaden thief
he is indeed jayden but he is a good man
not the thief anymore
what he is a good man
everyone please forgive david this time
so he can start over
is that okay they released david
laughed and said if so we will forgive
you for once
david was shocked he could not believe
that people let him go so easily
david stared at jaden and stammered you
have been recognized by everyone how can
you do that
didn't i tell you as long as i try and
continue doing good things
then there comes one day that everyone
will have to change their mind about me
david was so embarrassed he said just
blame me for not listening to you
it's too late to regret jayden said
nothing is too late
promise me try to correct your mistakes
and everyone will welcome you back
david hesitated and nodded after that
everyone worked together to reconstruct
the village with the contribution of
everyone
the village was soon rebuilt as good as
before
after the bridge was completed jaiden's
mother miraculously recovered
together they built a bigger house in
order to replace the old small one
the wyatt family no longer had to suffer
from their bad reputation
on the contrary they were respected and
loved by everyone in the region
soon after that the marriage of jaden
and laura was made official
everyone in the village was there to
bless them and they lived
happily ever after
fairy tales
once upon a time in a kingdom called
leonides
there was a stone statue of a lion with
its eyes closed
in the wasteland near a mountain
people in the area often told each other
that a long time ago
it was originally a beautiful lions
tattoo
with bright open eyes and it used to
guard the fields for the villagers
no one knew why and since when the
lion's tattoo had gradually become
forgotten
there was a well-off family nearby in
the
family there was a farmer living with
his two
sons the older brother's name was
cletus he was very greedy mean
and stingy in contrast his younger
brother
aljah was gentle and kind who loved to
learn new things
one day aldi decided to travel around
the world to
warden his mind however after a long
while he had to return immediately when
he heard that his father suddenly
passed away i've been a bad son
well now our dad is resting in peace
do not be too sad we should take a rest
first
cletus had married already
his wife was lyanna a greedy woman
just like her husband this is my wife
leona nice to meet you sis
yeah yeah hello huh
you still know your way back home huh
well you hadn't come back for so long
that gave me the control of the house
and everything
however the truth is cletus and his wife
secretly took over all of his father's
fortune
they spent a lot of money and enjoyed a
comfortable life
that is why when aljah had returned
leona showed her hatred towards him
because she didn't want him to take any
of their properties
clayton's wanted his brother to stay for
a few
days but leona felt annoyed
why did you let him stay here why do we
have to feed that useless man
and what if he asks us to share the
property
he is my brother regardless just let him
stay here for a few days
i don't care you have to find a way to
kick him
out of this house now okay
i know i know the greedy and
heartless couple discussed the plan to
kick aldr
out of the house
[Music]
brother father told me when you came
back
i'd have to take care of you but now
since i'm married
we can't live together like before it's
inconvenient
i think i should share the property with
you
yes i understand i will listen to you
i just got married and things are tough
so i will take the house and the land
and all the cattle and you will take the
old chest that father left in the attic
along with a dog and a cat in this house
okay i'm still single i don't need much
just do as you said i don't mind at all
aljah went to check out the old chest
that his father left in the attic
he opened it and saw a strange ancient
book that looked so mysterious
awesome a valuable ancient book
it is such a huge fortune for me
together with a dog
and the cat anja happily said goodbye to
his brother and leona
then left finally we could kick him
out of here aljah took the dog
and the cat to the wasteland near the
mountain to find a place to stay
they passed by the stone line statue
it's great my two friends this place is
very
suitable to set up a hut to rest
the dog and the cat seemed to understand
his words they
happily agreed
[Music]
they worked together as soon a simple
little hut
was peeled all right
this is our new lovely home starting
tomorrow
we will explore this wasteland to make a
living
algae spread straw in the hut and rested
with the two
animals in his spare time he took the
old book of his father
out to read the next morning they went
to the wasteland to work
on the way aljo was reading the old book
out loud
[Music]
when they passed by the lion statue
suddenly the ancient
book in his hands shined brightly
that's strange the book is shining
alger did not know this that the statue
of the line behind him
had awoken after thousands of years
right after he passed by alger
went to the field and started to work
with the dog and the cat
one man and two little animals plowed
the field together creating a strange
and interesting scene which made the
lion's tattoo laugh
[Music]
amazingly so many gold bars appeared
from the lion's mouth when it
laughed this was the most extraordinary
thing
aja had ever seen oh my god
it's real gold algeo quickly picked up
the gold bars
since then he became much wealthier than
his brother clatus
alja usually helped the poor people
around him
and was able to provide his cat and dog
a better life
he opened their largest bookstore in the
region
and invited people to come and read
books to expand their
knowledge as soon as cletus and lyanna
learned that audrey became
extremely wealthy they rushed to alger's
house to talk
alger told them the full story
[Music]
well you're so selfish you didn't even
tell your brother so he could get rich
as well
please don't talk like that what do you
mean
back when he was still poor we were the
ones who helped
him now he's rich he forgot about us huh
hey how about this can you give us the
book and the animals for just a few days
yes that's fine but my dog and cat
have been my close friends for years
when you keep them
please treat them well cletus and leona
happily took the dog and the cat and the
old book to the hut where aljah had
stayed
however they passed the book to each
other
my god i have never read books why did
you give it to me
i don't know how to read and it's a
very old and dusty book i don't even
want to touch it
the book fell in the straw and was
covered
the next morning the couple forced the
dog and the cat
to wake up early and work hard in the
field gleetus and leona didn't help them
at all
making the two little animals exhausted
when the lion statue saw that it was
amused and
laughed out loud making small pieces of
gold fall out
oh my god it is pure gold
unbelievable well well
i believe there's still a lot of gold in
its belly
we must find a way to take them all the
couple was
greedy clayton's reached into the lion's
mouth to find more gold
but since the lion didn't hear the
familiar raiding sound
it gradually felt sleepy and suddenly
closed its mouth
tightly and locked clayton's hand inside
leona help me i am stuck
my gosh what to do now
lyanna was so scared and rushed over
the two of them tried to pull with all
their strength
but it didn't help oh
you have to make the statue laugh so i
can get out
you lazy animals continue working
lime statue please laugh please
but this time the lion statue was still
asleep
and did not open its eyes at all
leona was forced to bring rice from home
and
fed her husband every day the wealth of
their house ran out quickly and very
soon after
they became poor
every day the couple sat and cried
together next to the statue
my dear only alger my brother
can save me now please go to his house
to ask him
maybe he will agree to come and rescue
me
[Music]
leona rushed to find alger and told him
everything
when he knew his brother was in trouble
he quickly went there to save him
immediately
when cletus saw his brother he was
very happy alger
i know that we did not treat you well
but now i can only rely on you
please find a way to save your greedy
brother
don't worry i won't leave you here
i just saw that the dog and the cat was
still there
but he didn't see the book leona where's
the ancient book that i gave you too
it's been missing for a long time i
don't know where it
is oh no hey doc and cat do you know
where that book is
help me find it fortunately
the loyal dog smelled and found the old
book
and told alger to follow it
here it is it is the right book my
brother can be saved
once again alger together with the dog
and the cat plowed
the field he read the old book out loud
while working
hearing the familiar reading sounds the
line starts to open
its eyes again it saw alger plowing the
field with the dog and the cat
the statue heavily laughed
god my arm is still okay i am free again
suddenly the ancient broken arch's hand
glowed
and it slowly flew towards the lion's
tattoo into its mouth
the statue immediately clothed its mouth
and eyes
and slapped us soundly as before
cletus and alger were very happy
they hugged each other well my dear
brother
you saved my life i am so sorry for
treating you
so badly after that day
claitus and leona had learned a great
lesson
they were no longer greedy and selfish
as they used to be
alger welcomed them to stay in his house
they live peacefully together until the
end of their life
[Laughter]
about the line statue since then
its eyes have always closed and no one
ever saw them open
again
fairy tales
once upon a time in the mediterranean
there lived a judge who was famous for
his intelligence
and integrity named axel
he had been able to solve the most
complicated cases
and he was really admired by everyone
one day when axel was wandering around
with his two guards
they occasionally heard
alex was really surprised when hearing
these voices
tyler said how could i be so foolish
like that
if only i had not fallen asleep my money
bag wouldn't have gone
how can i get the money to cure mom
axel and the guards went there and they
saw poor tyler was sadly sitting in the
middle of the road
beside a big rock axel asked
who are you why are you sitting there
lamenting
tyler sadly replied judge
i'm tyler a poor olive oil seller
[Music]
tyler thought about his life i live with
my mom
who has been sick all year every day i
make fragrant batches of olive oil and
sell them at the market
my family's life depends on the money i
make from selling olive oil
he continued this morning i went to the
market to sell olive oil as usual
and luckily i earned a good amount of
money
then he added happily if i borrow a
little more money
i would have enough to cure my mom so i
ran
everywhere to borrow finally i had
enough
and put it in a large money bag
tyler sat leaning against a large rock
he yawned weirdly
then laid his head back on the rock and
slept
on my way back home i felt very tired
after a long day of work
so i sat by this rock to take a quick
nap
tyler slowly opened his eyes he was
startled
fumbled all over his body and expressed
his panic
he looked around to search but when i
woke up
i realized that the money bag was gone
i couldn't find it anywhere so i
lamented sadly
and luckily reached your attention
please help me get that money back
it's all i have i would be very grateful
to you axel fought
then he nodded and said if that is the
case
someone must have probably come here and
taken the money back from you while you
were asleep
it's all right i promise to investigate
this case for you
the judge used a magnifying glass to
observe and look for traces around
however it seemed that axel had failed
axel asked it's too strange i haven't
been able to find any trace around here
it seems that the thief has completely
disappeared are you sure that no one
else has witnessed this incident
tyler nodded and said yes i woke up
no one has appeared axel asked again
do you suspect anyone tyler reflected
and shook his head sadly saying
i don't dare to suspect anyone just
blame me for being too
stupid axelnon
said what a conundrum well
everything is getting more interesting
troubled
tyler said sorry indeed i made it
difficult for you
because i have no witness axel
interrupted
laughing and said who told you there has
been no witness
this rock has been by your side from the
beginning to end of the case
it is the most important witness tyler
asked
startled this rock but sir
how can it be a witness axel smiled
mysteriously
you'll see smiling mysteriously
axel commanded the guards to carry the
big rock back to the court
then the young judge immediately had it
proclaimed throughout the village
that he would open an interrogation of a
rock because it was suspected of
stealing money from poor
tyler this news spread very quickly
everyone in the area was talking about
this this was partly because everyone
knew
tyler a kind and dutiful guy who
unfortunately lost his money bag
however it was mostly because the people
were all curious
they all wanted to know how axel could
interrogate
a rock two people were talking to each
other
really the judge would question a rock
until now i've never heard of anyone do
such a stupid thing
[Music]
what happened to our smart judge axel
today
how could a rock talk so
with great curiosity all the citizens
gathered together to axel's quote
looking forward to seeing this unique
interrogation
this news also reached zachary tyler's
neighbor
who was a greedy and cunning man
no one knew that he was the one who had
stolen tyler's bag
and had walked away smoothly zachary
held a large money bag in his hand
and said to himself perfect i didn't
leave any trace
without a witness who would believe that
stupid tyler
no judge would help him not even the
wise axel
just blame him for being too negligent
however when he heard that axel had
accepted to investigate the case
and summoned the rock for questioning
zachary began to worry
he went back and forth clasping his
hands
worried he thought interrogate the rock
i have never heard about this before how
could a rock say anything
wait who knows what if it can really
talk
zachary recalled
[Music]
that's right only the rock saw the whole
case
from the moment i had appeared until the
moment i stole the money bag and ran
away
then he thought if it really denounces
me what should i do
it's better to go over there and see how
he will interrogate the rock
so zachary also went to the court to see
the interrogation of the rock
outside the door all the people were
stopped by guards
no one was allowed to go inside everyone
was very curious about the harsh sounds
inside the court
they were extremely excited they huddled
together to hear the voices inside the
court
stubborn rock do you confess or not
was it you who stole the money bag from
tyler or
someone else of course the rock remained
inert
without saying anything the cries of
torturing the rock
and axel's words shouting from inside
made everyone
outside the court curious the people
gathered together
all of them wearing expressions of
curiosity listening attentively
even zachary was in the crowd also
looking curious
axel's angry voice echoed the stick is
broken again
this rock is so stubborn i broke three
sticks and it still hasn't said a word
the court axel angrily pointed at the
rock and shouted
but i do not believe that i can get
anything from you
you will definitely have to confess
unless you can't speak
the rock remained inert the people heard
axel's screams
they burst into laughter and were more
and more curious
[Music]
her judge is really foolish today
i really want to go inside and see how
he's interrogating the rock
suddenly the door was opened axel
appeared calmly in front of everyone
axel stepped out of the big open door
two guards immediately bowed he asked
loudly
why are all of you so noisy
the guards replied sir the people all
want to come inside and see you
interrogating that rock
axel looked at the crowd in front of him
they looked very eager
nodding furiously one citizen said
yes judge we all want to see you
questioning the rock
axel nodded thoughtfully then said
all right interrogating without the
audience is very boring anyway
i allow everyone to enter but on one
condition
axel placed the large basin of water on
the table and said
anyone who wants to see me must pay me a
coin here
it can be considered as a fee for all of
you to watch me interrogating that rock
one coin is nothing when you get to see
a case as unique as this
everyone happily dropped the coin into
the basin and joyfully entered the court
soon the basin was full of coins
axel was still standing beside the sink
he carefully observed every piece of
change
in the water of the basin finally it was
zachary's turn
like everyone else he dropped the coin
into the basin
immediately bubbles of oil emerged and
olive oil began to spread very quickly
on the surface of the water
it was exactly the thing that axel had
been waiting for
and he immediately called the guards
guards
quickly arrest this guy for me sir what
did i do
why are you arresting me
you still want to deny it you are the
one who stole
tyler's bag in this area tyler is the
only one who sells olive oil
therefore only his money can get olive
oil from his hands
however the coin you dropped into the
water basin was covered with olive oil
and it is still spreading that proves
you are the culprit who took
tyler's money bag do you have anything
to say
other than a confession that's zachary
my neighbor so it was you axel ordered
the guards to search all over zachary
and they discovered tyler's bag the
coins inside
were still covered with olive oil at
that time
zachary could not deny it anymore sir i
was so foolish
please forgive me tyler i'm sorry
my greed blinded me please help me
the day like every other day i went to
the forest to cut wood all day
when i got back i ran into tyler soundly
asleep by the rock
suddenly his money bag slipped off and
fell to the ground
i saw the gold and silver coins inside i
could not hold back my clip
after looking around and seeing no one
else
i gently took his pouch and left quickly
i thought that no one would see what i
had done
but when i heard you were investigating
the rock i was shocked and came here to
check the situation
i didn't expect that was just my trap
the rock cannot say anything you have
been easily trapped
now let's put him in jail and wait for
the trial
the guards quickly led zachary to a
dungeon
